```{r, load_packages, eval=T, include=FALSE}
library(PBSadmb)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
#library(Cairo)
library(xtable)
options(xtable.comment = FALSE)

# The model specs
mod_names <- c("2015 Model",
  "2016 update ",
  "2016 biomass ")
.MODELDIR = c(
  "../runs/15.1/", 
  "../runs/16.1/", 
  "../runs/16.1a/") 
.THEME    = theme_bw(base_size = 11, base_family = "")
.OVERLAY  = TRUE

# Read report file and create report object (a list):
fn       <- paste0(.MODELDIR, "For_R.rep")
M        <- lapply(fn, readList)
names(M) <- mod_names
```
